roleset.name: stick to

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: Grossly , [the mass] extends into the mucosa , muscle , and pericolonic fat , and is also adhesed [*]to a 29.0 cm segment of terminal ileum.
example.arg: a 29.0 cm segment of terminal ileum.

example.name: arg1
example.text: The ureter is adhesed but is grossly uninvolved .

roleset.note: ADHESE-V NOTES: Based on sentences in temprel data. Comparison to adhere.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from adhese.01-v)
ADHESED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8 . (from adhesed.01-j)
